post.text: Donald Trump construyó su campaña demonizando a inmigrantes y sus familias. Lo escuchamos claramente desde la primera vez. (Y la segunda vez, y la tercera, cuarta...).

comment.author: Mckenzie
comment.text: Hillary is corrupt down to her old sick bones. A quid pro quo scheme set up while she was a sitting Sec of State where foreign national interests and foreign wealthy interests get special pay to play treatment in exchange for money. That's as corrupt as it gets.

replies.author: Tyler
replies.text: Please kindly friend request me in a proper way

replies.author: Andrew
replies.text: Yeah honey, that's called politics. Go request your senators & congressmen's emails and then get back to us on who is playing quid pro quo. These witch hunts are nothing but diversions to excuse their behavior and hide the fact that they are not doing their jobs. But you will keep voting for them and then blaming everyone but yourself for your sucky life.

replies.author: Mckenzie
replies.text: Andrew : it's called corruption... and Hillary is as corrupt as it gets.
